page.title: 07SERVICES / MOBILE
page.content: Some services visit the village area once or twice a week, like the butcher's or fishmonger's van. An ice-cream van calls regularly as well. Goods which are delivered to people include coal (when ordered), milk (every day) and newspapers (morning and evening). The butcher's van, the fishmonger the coal merchant and ice-cream van visit lots of other small villages , many of which do not have their own specialist shops. This is useful because to buy meat or fish would mean a journey to Cottingham (7km) or Beverley (10km) otherwise.
